data.name: Jogward Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The official heavy metal soundtrack for Jogward by Myrgharok. Go medieval on your enemies while listening to these aggressive and hard hitting bangers.
data.about_the_game: The official heavy metal soundtrack for Jogward by Myrgharok. Go medieval on your enemies while listening to these aggressive and hard hitting bangers.
data.short_description: The official heavy metal soundtrack for Jogward by Myrgharok.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 210 MB available space
